SEARCH
Module net.cnoga.paint
Package net.cnoga.paint.core.brews

Class WorkspaceBrew

java.lang.Object
net.cnoga.paint.core.bus.EventBusPublisher
net.cnoga.paint.core.brews.WorkspaceBrew
public class WorkspaceBrew extends EventBusPublisher
Manages the lifecycle and state of all Workspace instances.

Handles creating, opening, closing, clearing, saving, and transforming workspaces, as well as managing their tabs in the UI. Integrates with the EventBus to respond to workspace-related events.

    • rotateAndMirrorInPlace

      private void rotateAndMirrorInPlace(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas, int degrees, boolean mirrorX, boolean mirrorY)
      Rotates and mirrors a canvas in place.

      This method resizes the canvas buffer if necessary and applies rotation and mirroring without replacing the canvas node.

      Parameters:
      canvas - the Canvas to transform
      degrees - rotation in degrees (90 degree increments)
      mirrorX - whether to mirror horizontally
      mirrorY - whether to mirror vertically
